lead_paragraph: U.S. Freestyle Aerialist Emily Cook suffered an injury one month before the 2002 Olympics. Sports writer Bill Pennington describes her journey to Turin. (Producer: Kassie Bracken)
snippet: U.S. Freestyle Aerialist Emily Cook suffered an injury one month before the 2002 Olympics. Sports writer Bill Pennington describes her journey to Turin. (Producer: Kassie Bracken)
